member.summary: Returns the current valid ad and if needed, starts the web request for fetching the next ad.
member.param: Flag to decide if we need to notify the caller when the new ad fetch is complete.

Flag to decide if we need to force download the next ad. This will only work if there is no pending ad download and when we need to refresh the current ad even though its still valid (like AdControl got re-sized). If the currently pending ad downloads needs to be invalidated as well, the caller should cancel them before calling this function.
